dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: You know, I think a lot of people assume city development plans are just set in stone by officials, but that's not the case at all.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know, I think a lot of people assume city development plans are just set in stone by officials, but that's not the case at all.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. Like, Akim Zhenis Kassymbek just mentioned that they're considering a new beach near Triathlon Park, but it's totally up for debate.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. Like, Akim Zhenis Kassymbek just mentioned that they're considering a new beach near Triathlon Park, but it's totally up for debate.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As for the location you mentioned near the northern Triathlon Park, it is currently under consideration, said Kassymbek in response to a resident's question. He added that not all residents support the idea of building a new beach close to residential buildings, emphasizing that the matter requires thorough consideration.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and he made it clear—some residents are for it, some are really against having a beach so close to their homes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and he made it clear-some residents are for it, some are really against having a beach so close to their homes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Some people are in favor of it, while others are not. There are residents living nearby who oppose the idea of a beach there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he emphasized that public hearings are a must. They can't just push it through without some kind of consensus.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he emphasized that public hearings are a must. They can't just push it through without some kind of consensus.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Without public hearings and some form of consensus, a decision like this cannot be made. We need to study the matter, do the calculations, and conduct public hearings, the akim concluded.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which honestly makes sense. You don't wanna build something that divides the neighborhood, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which honestly makes sense. You don't wanna build something that divides the neighborhood, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And it's not like this is the first time they've talked about beaches in Astana—remember the Beisekova Street proposal back in 2022?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And it's not like this is the first time they've talked about beaches in Astana-remember the Beisekova Street proposal back in twenty twenty two?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, that never moved forward either. It seems like these projects need way more than just a spot on a map.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, that never moved forward either. It seems like these projects need way more than just a spot on a map.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And beyond beaches, they talked about improving courtyards, street lighting… all that quality-of-life stuff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And beyond beaches, they talked about improving courtyards, street lighting... all that quality-of-life stuff.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the meeting, other topics were also addressed, including the improvement of courtyards and public spaces, street lighting, landscaping, transport accessibility, and the development of social infrastructure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's good they're thinking holistically. A beach is fun, but people care about everyday livability too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's good they're thinking holistically. A beach is fun, but people care about everyday livability too.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. Though I gotta say, a beach in Astana does sound pretty appealing, especially in the summer.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, no doubt! But yeah, it's all about finding that balance and getting residents on board first.

dialogue_turns.text: Couldn't agree more. Let's see where those public discussions lead.
